meanings.definition: Undergo a change in form or nature
meanings.sent1: The caterpillar metamorphosed into a butterfly.
meanings.sent2: The tadpole metamorphosed into a frog.
meanings.sent3: The old house metamorphosed into a modern mansion.
meanings.sent4: Her confidence metamorphosed from timid to bold.
meanings.sent5: The barren land metamorphosed into a lush garden.

meanings.sent1: The ugly duckling metamorphosed into a beautiful swan.
meanings.sent2: The pumpkin metamorphosed into a carriage in the fairy tale.
meanings.sent3: The caterpillar metamorphosed into a butterfly costume for Halloween.
meanings.sent4: His anger metamorphosed into forgiveness over time.
meanings.sent5: The plain caterpillar metamorphosed into a stunning butterfly.

meanings.definition: Change in physical form or substance
meanings.sent1: The metamorphosed rock displayed beautiful colors.
meanings.sent2: The metamorphosed clay turned into a sturdy pot.
meanings.sent3: The metamorphosed ice cream melted too quickly in the sun.
meanings.sent4: The metamorphosed caterpillar amazed the children.
meanings.sent5: The metamorphosed tree trunk became a work of art.
